config_name: Binary Daily - caffeine timing daily cutoff

configuration_json.formula: if (last_caffeine_time <= cutoff_time) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-BINARY-DAILY: Daily pass/fail based on finishing caffeine by 2pm every day

metadata.recommendation_text: Finish all caffeinated beverages by 2pm every day of the week

analysis.reasoning: SC-BINARY-DAILY: Daily evaluation pattern since requirement is every single day
